config.placeholder: The passed-in arguments will be used

script:
if [[ -n "${target_path}" ]]; then
  ../.common/finder-comment clear '' "${(f)target_path[@]}"
elif [[ "${#}" -gt 0 ]]; then
  ../.common/finder-comment clear '' "${@}"
else
  echo 'Either a valid input or configuration is required' >&2
  exit 1
fi
taskDescription: Unsets the Finder comment of the passed-in path
